text: @AdvoBarryRoux Apparently some doctors says they were instructed by the government to say whoever died, they must write its Covid19 even if it's not. I think they doing it for the UN. To get money. The more ppl die of this virus the more the country get funding💔💔💔💔💔💔💔AMASIMBA
